ModMetaData.name: No Pawn Left Behind
ModMetaData.author: newcolonist
ModMetaData.description:
Pawns left behind somehow made it... but they've been captured. This mod creates a prisoner camp quest for pawns left behind, so you can carefully randomize pawns left behind to rescue them later in game.
8/4/19: increased base chance, longer timeout, fixed duplicated pawns
